website_summaries.verdict: The best value available. You won't find a better compression sleeve that offers more for less.
pros: Boasts a reliable silicone band that prevents slipping
Available in numerous fun colors and styles as well as youth sizes
cons: Some find that it runs slightly large, but selecting a different size remedies this concern

customer_reviews.title: Need to purchase more if these stylish sleeves!
customer_reviews.text: The reason for purchasing this product was to prevent my son from self injuries like biting, hitting, and pinching himself. I found out that having a compression sleeve on his arms helps him sooth himself and relax. He is autistic among other development and cognitive disabilities. These sleeves have worked very well. Thank you.
customer_reviews.author: Paula Chavez

customer_reviews.title: My father couldn't be any happier!
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my dad as a Father's Day present. He wears them to work every day to help with working in the heat outside as a mailman. The rubber at the top of the sleeve prevents it from sliding down his arm- he loves it! Order number:
customer_reviews.author: Tomi

customer_reviews.title: Not only "cool" ooking but keeps your arms warm!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered two of these for my son's 12th birthday. He has been wanting arm sleeves for a couple years now and finally we did some research and purchased this brand. Needless to say, he wore them for every football practice and game and loved them! They also kept his arms warm during the cold football season and of course his friends thought that they were cool. Will definitely buy again in the future!
customer_reviews.author: mom2boys

customer_reviews.title: Great arm protection
customer_reviews.text: They have already proved to be valuable. My husband is on chemo which makes his skins tear easily. He wears these when he does anything in the garage or outside and he has gotten no more skin tears. He likes the Steeler colors.
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Holtman

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it!
customer_reviews.text: My 8yr old son begged me for this arm sleeve after seeing a few of his teammates with it. I used the guidelines provided to measure the correct size, and hoped that it fit his little arm. The arm sleeve arrived timely, and was just as expected. It comes in some great colors, but I purchased the black camo. My son was so excited. He keeps it in a special place, and wears it during his basketball games.
customer_reviews.author: NikkiT

customer_reviews.title: Billy Miller was wonderful, and told me to keep the smaller one ...
customer_reviews.text: I really appreciated the fact that I was able to speak to a human being ON A SUNDAY AFTERNOON at Bucwild when the arm sleeve turned out to be too small for my grandson. Billy Miller was wonderful, and told me to keep the smaller one and that they would send out a larger size at no extra charge! I will definitely be ordering more of these arm sleeves from Bucwild. They are made well, and cost less than other ones I have bought in retail stores.
customer_reviews.author: Linda A. Nelson

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my then 5 year old son who is now 6 and he absolutely loved the socks and the arm sleeve that matched. The colors were as shown online and matched his football uniform very well. He loved that while he looked and matched his teammates he had a little bit of individuality in these. The socks kept his legs warm and also helped to keep his football pants from sliding down his legs at the bottom. The sleeve aided a little bit flash to his uniform and he didn't want to take it off. I would definitely purchase again
customer_reviews.author: Ty

customer_reviews.title: these are not real medical grade compression sleeves
customer_reviews.text: product is simply made of thin spandex type material. similar to a pair of a women's leggings. purchased correct size and fits well just doesn't compress like others. it's like cutting sleeves of a tight shirt
customer_reviews.author: garrettglidden

customer_reviews.title: Sizing off, sold as half a pair.
customer_reviews.text: This is way too tight to be Adult large, and XL isn’t even offered. This fits my wife who is 5’2” and 105 lbs. a little bitty gal. Sizing is alright if you want a tourniquet on your upper arm. Do not recommend due to sizing. Why aren’t these sold in pairs. Didn’t catch that, before buying. Guess you suppose to leave one arm home when you go ride your motorcycle.
customer_reviews.author: Cajun

customer_reviews.title: Love the sleeve. Came in 3 days.
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the green/yellow/white arm sleeve and it's a very good and comfy sleeve. 5 stars because it's comfy, it came in 3 days when it was supposed to come in 9, and it has a nice stretchy quality. A small will fit a 15-16 year old. The ONLY thing I was upset with was the color of it. When it says green, I thought of a darker shade of green, not neon green like I got. I am on The Athletics, so the color of it is a little to bright green. But I can't change that, so it's still 5 stars. Great sleeve!
customer_reviews.author: Evan

customer_reviews.title: No size is going to give you compression where needed
customer_reviews.text: it was slightly too large. The company sent me another one but same problem the compression isn’t in the elbow. Top and bottom is tight and cuts your blood supply. You pay for what you get so lesson learned. Moving to another
customer_reviews.author: Michelle E.

customer_reviews.title: Bought 2! Will buy a 3rd!
customer_reviews.text: I have purchased 2 and will be purchasing another. It’s hard to find little boys arm sleeves in the stores and especially at such a reasonable price! The colors are bold and the fit is snug. There is no rolling down and they wash well! I don’t dry them., air dry. I would suggest to size up. The xsm was too tight for a 6 year old.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Firm on the Arm and keeps muscles warm
customer_reviews.text: I use this for racquetball. It does seem to help. After an injury and a Bursa Sack on elbow compression was recommended by doc. This item goes from base of the wrist to approx. 4 inches from crook of armpit (I am 6' tall). It is firm all the way but not tight. Washable. I think that keeping the arm warm is the big thing as muscles stay loose which is important as we go sometimes 3 hours +. Will likely get at least one more.
customer_reviews.author: Bill

customer_reviews.title: Too expensive for the material quality
customer_reviews.text: These have a nice look to them, clean well, fit well, but after several wears, the edges start to fray, so I feel they are too expensive because of needing to be replaced more often than they should be.
customer_reviews.author: SMR

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I was veryyyy excited to get this product I tried it on and cut off circulation, my hand was turning purple . The band at the top is wayyyyyyy too tight . Either loosen that joker up or figure out a way to have it expand more . I wouldn’t buy again .
customer_reviews.author: John Phillips

customer_reviews.title: Super small
customer_reviews.text: Seems well made, but runs super small. I order the largest size available, and the elastic band at the top is so tight it is painful. Too bad, because the rest of the sleeve was sized about right.
customer_reviews.author: Jim K

customer_reviews.title: I would not recommend this product
customer_reviews.text: Measured and purchased the correct size. The compression lasted maybe 3-5 wears, as in days. Perhaps this was how they were designed however I expect more from a product. Regardless, I would not recommend this product.
customer_reviews.author: Penny King

customer_reviews.title: Same as in stores
customer_reviews.text: Just like the ones in stores only cheaper. Know your size. The small would fit a kid under 70 lbs.
customer_reviews.author: Ktboughtit

customer_reviews.title: Son likes it but seams came off in first week.
customer_reviews.text: My son said the seams started to fall apart the first week. Still liked the look of it.
customer_reviews.author: Craig F

customer_reviews.title: Good buy but needs a minor fix.
customer_reviews.text: It's good for working out and weight lifting. But the tag on the inside really irritates your arm so that needs to be cut out or taped over. Still it's a good product. I bought like 10 cause I wear them to work as I do physical labor. It helps keep me from over stretching my muscles.
customer_reviews.author: JustinCase

customer_reviews.title: Enjoying my window again
customer_reviews.text: I had a wreck that turned my truck on it’s side my arm get the bad end of it , I have a large spot of like baby skin on my arm, this product let me hang my arm out the window with out getting sunburnt, been having to keep my arm inside the car and out of the sun
customer_reviews.author: David M White

customer_reviews.title: Works Great
customer_reviews.text: My doctor recommended a compression sleeve due to medical issues, one at the local pharmacy was $65. I purchased this sleeve hoping it would make do. This sleeve surpassed my expectations. The fit is good and it has helped my pain. Kind of wish the color was solid but it hats a minor issue and just my wishes. I would highly recommend this sleeve if you are in need of one.
customer_reviews.author: Kim Barker

customer_reviews.title: Disappointed
customer_reviews.text: If I'm gonna be honest, I'm dissatisfied. All the other sleeves I looked at were sold in pairs and i guess i just assumed yours was sold in pairs. I did go back and look at your site and it does clearly say 1 sleeve so it's on me. I was gonna return it and buy somewhere else but i was gonna get charged for returning it, only reason i kept it
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: A bit tight on the bicep if on the higher end of a size.
customer_reviews.text: I tried on the sleeve and it's a bit tight around my bicep and slightly uncomfortable. I bought the correct size, I might've been on the upper end of one size, but I moved the sleeve up to my shoulder to avoid some of the squeeze. I'll hopefully update this review after I get a chance to use the sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Dentel

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: this is a kid sleeve this sleeve would never fit an adult arm.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Wallace

customer_reviews.title: I was disappointed to find only one per pack
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for my kids. 7 an 10. When I purchased, I was disappointed to find only one per pack. I had to re order to get two of each. This brought the price up to almost$25 per pair. At that price I will not order again. However my kids do like them.
customer_reviews.author: Erik T.

customer_reviews.title: Pretty, but doesn't fit how I needed it
customer_reviews.text: Like it, but it's too loose around my lower am. Very tight on my bicep, but that's the only part this sleeve fits. I needed a sleeve for circulation purposes. This won't work for me
customer_reviews.author: Elisa

customer_reviews.title: Love it
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair and wore it to Disneyland, I got a lot of attention in a good way and everyone was asking me what is it. I was the only one that had them at the time. I'm going to order more pairs in different colors. It feels soft and I bought the biggest size
customer_reviews.author: Kendo

customer_reviews.title: Amazing service and works great!
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the wrong size arm sleeve and emailed the company to see if I could get my arm sleeve exchanged. They responded back in a couple of minutes and shipped a brand new arm sleeve to me free. I have my arm sleeve right now and I got it for gaming and it works really well. It has very breathable fabric, it stays cool when its hot and stays warm when it's cold. It also doesn't allow for sweat to build up under the sleeve which is great! If I had to rate the service and product they would each get 5-stars!
customer_reviews.author: Pack

customer_reviews.title: Just get them!
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my 11 year old for football. They are awesome and match his teams colors perfectly. My son is 5 ft and 110 lbs. I bought him an adult small. Plan to buy my boyfriend and I sets
customer_reviews.author: Gina

customer_reviews.title: What a great gift for my grandson!  He loves his baseball sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my grandson! He loves it! Actually he hasn’t taken it off his arms for three days! I’m going to Order him another one so we can wash the other. ❤️ I wasn’t sure it would fit his arm but it was perfect!!
customer_reviews.author: T Kirkley

customer_reviews.title: Good for tendonitis/nerve pain
customer_reviews.text: I'm a drummer with chronic tendonitis in my right arm. I ordered adult small & im practically preteen sized and it fits just fine. Really helps with pain relief while drumming and keeps cool. I combine this with one of those tennis elbow straps and i can play as long as I need to vs only being able to go 30 to 45 mins before
customer_reviews.author: Punkerz88

customer_reviews.title: Stays up!
customer_reviews.text: My son wanted a compression sleeve for no other reason than to look cool. These are great! They are reasonably priced, they stay up, and the print is “cool”. We didn’t read the description very well and he was disappointed that it only came with one sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: KT

customer_reviews.title: Quick and friendly service - Great quality!!
customer_reviews.text: We didn't read the sizing chart so we ordered the wrong size for our 8 yr old. But Bucwild was very accommodating and quick to ship the correct sizes sleeves (YM is the smallest size). The sleeves keep our son's arms nice and warm during football and the color is true to the picture. Thank you for the great customer service and product!
customer_reviews.author: MacroMomma

customer_reviews.title: Awesome compression sleeves!!
customer_reviews.text: They fit perfectly based on the measurement guide online, they match and complement his football uniform perfectly, they are very durable and are very breathable. He's played on 90 degree days and the sleeves are not sweaty!!
customer_reviews.author: KMA

customer_reviews.title: Highly recommend
customer_reviews.text: You know, I used to think these things were dumb as f*** but now that I'm "not as young as I used to be," wearing this sleeve noticeably makes a difference in overall comfort when lifting.
customer_reviews.author: andy

customer_reviews.title: Great Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Great quality! I bough this for my 5 year old son and he loves it. There is sturdy elastic at the top and bottom that keeps the sleeve from slipping during his basketball games. The fabric is stretchy and easy to play in. I liked it so much I bought one for my daughter!
customer_reviews.author: Ashley Kuhn

customer_reviews.title: Accurate Size
customer_reviews.text: My son has been wanting an arm sleeve for baseball for months. We were worried that we wouldn't find one that would fit him (he is seven and very slender). This one fits perfectly, and he loves the look!!
customer_reviews.author: Grace

customer_reviews.title: I've loved having this
customer_reviews.text: I've loved having this. I wear over a tennis elbow sleeve and it keeps it feeling cool which I think helps with swelling and discomfort after long days in tournaments.
customer_reviews.author: That1guy

customer_reviews.title: Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: My son wears this 3X a week for the past 6 weeks for hot sweaty practice and it's still going strong. We wash it almost daily in machine and hang dry. It still fits and hasn't seemed to stretch out. May be slightly faded from sun & wear but not bad at all. It keeps abrasions from happening and of course it looks cool! He loves it. Size was true.
customer_reviews.author: Deucedollar24

customer_reviews.title: My little slugger loves his arm sleeve.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for my 5yo son and he loves it. His cousins loved it so much that I ended up ordering them each one. Super cute. They range from 4-7 and the I got the YM for all of them. It is a little big on all 3 but by spring I think it should fit great.
customer_reviews.author: V. Edmonds

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is off
customer_reviews.text: I ordered a small which is my size, but it was way too big to wear.
customer_reviews.author: Finlandia

customer_reviews.title: Love them, America and Baseball
customer_reviews.text: I looked all over town for a sleeve for my grandson, he is 10 and very thin. He is in little league and pitching this year. Not sure of the size, I ordered 1 Youth Med and 1 Youth Small. The medium fit perfect, he loves this sleeve. You made a little boy very happy, he picked the pattern, America and Baseball what could be better. His little brother playing his first year of little league got the YS, he feels the same. Two very happy baseball players and a happy grandma.
customer_reviews.author: Debbie - Las Vegas

customer_reviews.title: Sizes not accurate
customer_reviews.text: The measurements are not exact. We ordered a medium based on measuring my sons arm and it was too tight. So, we returned and got a large and it is a little big. But, overall the quality is fine.
customer_reviews.author: Heather Sampson

customer_reviews.title: Color off but still added swag
customer_reviews.text: Color is a little off. It didn’t match his football uniform like I thought it would. Still added swag. For tightly on his arms so he needed help sliding them on. He wore them the whole game with no complaints.
customer_reviews.author: DEEVUH

customer_reviews.title: Meets expectations.
customer_reviews.text: Matches everything we own. Wish I was able to order two tho but the seller was out of stock. Seems good. Nice sizing wish I would’ve went up a little so it fits next year but it’s a perfect fit this year so I’m happy!
customer_reviews.author: Tone

customer_reviews.title: Not compression
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for problems with lymphadema. This is not true compression if you need it for medical purposes. It is thin, tight fitting material, with a tight, non stretchy band at the top. Terribly uncomfortable.
customer_reviews.author: AP

customer_reviews.title: Kids love these. They keep their arms warm during cooler ...
customer_reviews.text: Kids love these. They keep their arms warm during cooler spots seasons and also keep the lacrosse gear from chafing the upper arm. The construction is solid but the non slip elastic band on the top is slightly uncomfortable after extended wear.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Graser

customer_reviews.title: sleeve seems great, my son really likes it
customer_reviews.text: So first off, sleeve seems great, my son really likes it. Secondly, customer service was great. I made the mistake of ordering one too small (definitely listen to that advice of ordering up if the measurements are close). Called bucwild and they shipped out a replacement that day at no cost to me. Very happy with this purchase all around.
customer_reviews.author: Jason Snuggs

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 8-year-old son to wear for baseball after he saw others wearing similar sleeves. It's perfect. He loves it.
customer_reviews.author: CMoser

customer_reviews.title: fits and performs as expected
customer_reviews.text: This sleeve fit well as I followed the measurement charts. It has a sleek comfortable fabric. Its purpose is to move fluid up the arm.
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia Corey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: Very nice. It fulfills its purpose as intended. I especially like the idea that there's this odd rubbery like piece on the top of these that allow it to stay on. Granted, yes, you do have to pull them back up here and there, but that's alright I suppose.
customer_reviews.author: THORONOS_

customer_reviews.title: perfect for our little football player
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is teeny, and wants to play football. The XS was perfect for her! She wears it everywhere. It looks pretty sweet too.
customer_reviews.author: mom2twins+1

customer_reviews.title: Great Style for the Sport
customer_reviews.text: I just want to note the only reason I gave it a 4 satr is because going by the length decription chart on the site. The product didnt match the measurement. It was a little longer that what I wanted , but to avoid having an upset child and sending it back we worked with it. For future buyers, purchase it a length under your self measurement from the chart.
customer_reviews.author: Sports Dad

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: I just received this compression sleeve for my 12 yr old son. For those wondering about sizing, he's 5'2" and 120 lbs, and the adult small fits perfectly! He's a pitcher and he really likes how it feels during his practices, says his arm feels better with it on. The sleeve arrived on time and seems to be very well made.
customer_reviews.author: C. Wayne

customer_reviews.title: Son loves it
customer_reviews.text: got this for my 9 year old - in Gator colors. He loves it as it fis perfectly. Although he hasn't worn it in a baseball game yet, so I can;t tell you all how he likes it for that purpose, yet. He wears it to play pick up football and around the house.
customer_reviews.author: Chilli

customer_reviews.title: Good price to save your arm
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband. He streams and kept getting road rash on his arm from moving the mouse across the desk top. This allows for friction free movement without adding bulk. Wish it came in other patterns though.
customer_reviews.author: CrankyAgnes

customer_reviews.title: Fit is very tough to overcome with these types of Compression sleeves...most are too small/tight!
customer_reviews.text: Too small...ordered bigger size for youth and the biggest size for adult in two different purchases...proper fit could not be achieved. Kept because of a pass-down to smaller people.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Regan

customer_reviews.title: fits as expected
customer_reviews.text: cute way to support breast cancer awareness- something my son is passionate about showing in his clothing choices.
customer_reviews.author: thejoysofraisingboys

customer_reviews.title: Tons of looks
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my bowling arm to help with elbow soreness. Does the job well, got tons of looks and people asking where I got it from.
customer_reviews.author: Winter is coming

customer_reviews.title: Be sure to measure
customer_reviews.text: My daughter is 10. She weighs about 75lbs. She isn’t that tiny. I ordered the YM and it falls off of her. She was pretty sad. She normally wears a YL or adult small but this arm sleeve was too big.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Rodriguez

customer_reviews.title: I would recommend.
customer_reviews.text: It was a little tighter than I expected-but I wouldn’t necessarily call that a bad thing. Color is fantastic!
customer_reviews.author: Holly

customer_reviews.title: This is a great overall product
customer_reviews.text: This is a great overall product. This Basketball arm sleeve has helped me through shooting and looking cool. There are positives & negatives things about this product. I'd say there can't any other sleeve out there with the same quality & value. I would recommend this to any starting basketball players.The cool-dry fit is amazing & keeps me from sweating.I am very happy about this purchase. Very Satisfied Saven
customer_reviews.author: Saven V.

customer_reviews.title: Maybe order a size smaller
customer_reviews.text: The arm sleeve is good but every time I threw the ball I found myself having to pull my sleeve because it kept sliding down (so maybe order a size smaller). I really love the material and it doesn’t cause my arm to sweat too much when playing.
customer_reviews.author: amie krueger

customer_reviews.title: Returned
customer_reviews.text: A Large Adult size, was not large nor did it seem like it was for adults.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not much compression.
customer_reviews.text: There was little compression. Maybe these are made for athletes. I wanted it to provide support for arm while I work at the desk. If you have small wrist and forearm and larger upper I don’t know if it will work for you. Maybe I just got the wrong size.
customer_reviews.author: Shereen

customer_reviews.title: ONLY GET ONE ARM! ITS USELESS.
customer_reviews.text: You ONLY GET ONE ARM! Basically way overpriced and you only get one arm. Its useless. Buy the Kast King arm sleeves, you get two and they are the same price as one here. I guess my other arm just gets sunburned with this product.
customer_reviews.author: sonorajeep

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeve
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this. He’s been using for a while and still looks like new. Great sleeve.
customer_reviews.author: ncmummy

customer_reviews.title: it's only one
customer_reviews.text: love these but be aware you're only buying one lol make sure to put two in your cart.
customer_reviews.author: Renteria

customer_reviews.title: Runs small
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it but it is a bit snug in the upper arm area. He’s not heavy, but he is very strong - to be aware and order up for comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Leisure Gypsy

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeve!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves his sleeve! He said he looks like a pro football player now! Sleeve is made well.
customer_reviews.author: April Braswell

customer_reviews.title: Sizing is a crap shoot Seller won’t exchange
customer_reviews.text: Sizing is a crap shoot I got Youth M for my 11yr old average size son, way too small and seller won’t exchange or return them So if anybody wants them just reach out I have two you can have for free!! Susannahmoss@me .com
customer_reviews.author: Susannah Scheideman

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit ~
customer_reviews.text: Love this sleeve. My son plays baseball and wanted a few sleeves. He switches out between this one and a few others that we got. They have been washed, but not put in the dryer just in case it were to shrink. It's actually a good size and he is a pretty tall 13 year old.
customer_reviews.author: T. Cagan

customer_reviews.title: Tight fit.
customer_reviews.text: Seems a bit smaller than a large. First time fit was super tight. I have 16 1/2 inch biceps. Will continue to wear to see if fit relaxes with wear.
customer_reviews.author: Derrick

customer_reviews.title: Removable during bicycle rides
customer_reviews.text: What i like most is when it warms up in Florida during my bicycle rides i can take them off and just put them in a jersey pocket.
customer_reviews.author: Rick Keaser

customer_reviews.title: I really like this Compression Arm Sleeve
customer_reviews.text: I really like this Compression Arm Sleeve, it's the right size and helps me with the circulation in my arm. I lift weights in the gym and sometimes my left arm hurts after lifting and as soon as I get home I will put this on and the pain goes away. In addition, I like the colors.
customer_reviews.author: QT1007

customer_reviews.title: Nice!
customer_reviews.text: Bought this for my 9 yr old son who is 77 lbs. The youth large fit perfect. Very nice looking as well.
customer_reviews.author: ChristinaM

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Very poor quality and very tight fitting for the size
customer_reviews.author: nina minic-earl

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My boys really really like the product. They wear it daily to practice/games.
customer_reviews.author: Janine

customer_reviews.title: Fun and Practical
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loved the compression arm sleeve. He’s gotten a lot of positive feedback because the sleeve resembles a baseball.
customer_reviews.author: baseball mom

customer_reviews.title: Great addition
customer_reviews.text: My 7 year old loves it! Matches his Orioles uniform perfectly! Another kid on the team got one after seeing his.
customer_reviews.author: BakerBee

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: These feel great on my arms. I have very bad tendonitis and this seems to help compress everything.
customer_reviews.author: FastestMommy ever

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: My son plays basketball and has been wanting one of these. I bought this and he absolutely loves it! Very good material and made to last!
customer_reviews.author: Happy customer

customer_reviews.title: Great delivery
customer_reviews.text: My grandson loves his new compression sleeve. I ordered it and it arrived In one day. Thanks so much
customer_reviews.author: Sue

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t provide compression
customer_reviews.text: This feels nice & all but it doesn’t provide ANY actual compression except for at the ends
customer_reviews.author: Tom

customer_reviews.title: great!
customer_reviews.text: good quality and fits great. can wash over and over and still in tact. no fading. on fringing.
customer_reviews.author: JennSki

customer_reviews.title: Great product
customer_reviews.text: Honestly I thought Waring this would make my arm hot and sweaty, but when I put it on my arm stayed the same if not colder. I took it out and practiced with it and my arm was feeling great, much better then it usually feels. The one thing that I did not like was having it on felt a little weird, but other than that it was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Friendlydude

customer_reviews.title: Great sleeve
customer_reviews.text: Perfect size & look for my son. Have purchased more since
customer_reviews.author: Heather Joyce

customer_reviews.title: Cool Baller Gear
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 9 year old baller, so he could look like his big brother. He loved it.
customer_reviews.author: TJ's Mom

customer_reviews.title: Expensive for what it is
customer_reviews.text: Sleeve itself is fine. Just expensive for what it is. I never ordred the item if it was only one arm sleeve for the price.
customer_reviews.author: Hallow Win

customer_reviews.title: Fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: Purchased for our son, and he loves it. Followed the sizing guide and the fit was great.
customer_reviews.author: Victoria M. Stamm

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this for my 8 year old son. It fits him perfectly and he LOVES it. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah L. Davis

customer_reviews.title: Love the way they look in person
customer_reviews.text: Love the way these look in person. Keeps the fun off my husband’s arms while he works outside. Durable and fits perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Michele Gardner

customer_reviews.title: BUCWILD!!!!! I’m Just stunned!! They came through, and Their products are above what they advertise!
customer_reviews.text: I bought 2 of them for myself. I’m still participating in a non pro adult sports leagues we have around Wausau, Wisconsin. BUCWILD delivered!!!! They definitely aren’t your same old online retailer. They might be online but their really your hometown neighborhood store. And we all enjoy our hometown businesses, because they just feel good. I also received a 25% off my next order coupon, just because!!!
customer_reviews.author: Jason Stickle

customer_reviews.title: Large was a perfect fit....
customer_reviews.text: My 8 year old sons baseball team ordered these you match thier uniforms. The large was a perfect fit. Another parent advised us that a large would fit perfect for our 8 and 9 year old boys. I would recommend the large (L) the fit great for his slim arms.
customer_reviews.author: Tish B

customer_reviews.title: Multipurpose!
customer_reviews.text: I actually used this to protect some fresh scars on my daughter from the high intensity beach sun...didn't want to burn that fresh new skin...worked like a charm! Now she will use it for volleyball!

product_meta.title: bucwild Sports Compression Arm Sleeve - Youth & Adult Sizes - Baseball Football Basketball Sports (1 Arm Sleeve)
product_meta.description:
Bucwild Sports Compression arm sleeve was designed to be worn comfortably all day long for all day compression. 

***WHY COMPRESSION?***

- Soft sweat wicking material keeps skin cool in the summer, and warm in the winter.
- Protect arms from harmful UV rays. 
- Great arm/Elbow support
- Improves circulation


***COMPRESSION ARM SLEEVES ARE PERFECT FOR***

- Running 
- Golf
- Basketball 
- Baseball 
- Football
- Volleyball
- Tennis 
- Cycling 
- UV Protection - And all types of activities!

***PLEASE NOTE*** 
To guarantee you order a perfect fitting sleeve please measure the largest part of your relaxed bicep, and choose the size that matches your bicep measurement. If your measurement falls between 2 sizes we suggest choosing the larger size. 

Size:
Youth Small: Bicep 6-7" - Sleeve Length: 12"
Youth Medium: Bicep 7-8" - Sleeve Length: 14" 
Youth Large: Bicep 8-9" - Sleeve Length: 15" 
Adult Small: Bicep 10-13" - Sleeve Length: 16"
Adult Medium: Bicep 13-15" - Sleeve Length: 17"
Adult Large:Bicep 15-17" - Sleeve Length: 18"

All items listed are manufactured for, and distributed solely by Bucwild Sports
feature_bullets: Bucwild Sports Arm Sleeve is perfect for athletes in baseball basketball football golf tennis cycling bowling running volleyball
Our no slip silicone band will make sure your sleeve stays where you want it.
Bucwild Sports sleeve features moisture wicking material that will keep your arms dry, and your muscles warm. Material: 80% polyester/20% spandex
***IMPORTANT*** Choose Size That Matches Your Bicep Measurement: Child Sizes: Youth Medium (7-8”) Youth Large (8-9”) Adult Sizes: Small (10-13”) Medium (13-15”) Large (15-17”)
